lazy

Class Theme

  • java.lang.Object
    • lazy.Theme

  • public class Theme
extends java.lang.Object
    Data container for individual theme colors.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Theme(int windowBorder, int normalBackground, int focusBackground, int normalForeground, int focusForeground)
      The only available constructor for this class.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Theme

        public Theme(int windowBorder,
             int normalBackground,
             int focusBackground,
             int normalForeground,
             int focusForeground)
        The only available constructor for this class. Enforces specifying all the available values as parameters.
        Parameters:
        windowBorder - color of the border lines
        normalBackground - background of idle elements
        focusBackground - background of currently selected elements
        normalForeground - foreground of idle elements
        focusForeground - foreground of currently selected elements
